name: Thrones of Fantasy Idle RPG
description:
Engage in this grand battle in The Thrones of Fantasy! Create your own character and enter a fantasy world, where you take part in the King's tournaments, get help from the local shopkeeper, and excel in your path to glory! Collect investments, watch your character grow in this SEMI-IDLE RPG. Buy items to help your character along his journey, and become the most renowned fighter in all the land!

Some things only unlock once you are over a specific level, after specific events, or after you have the right items. You will need to find how what these things are.

FEATURES:
-Great timer-based battle system!
-Character creation and growth! Build the ultimate warrior to fight in the King's Tournaments!
